champ.name: Tutorial Basic
champ.descr: Basic tutorial on simplest tracks. One lap on each track. To learn different road surfaces: gravel, wet gravel, snow.

champ.name: Tutorial Banked
champ.descr: Easy tutorial with short tracks having banked turns.

champ.name: Tutorial Bridges
champ.descr: Tutorial on medium length tracks with bridges.

champ.name: Tutorial Terrain
champ.descr: Tutorial with short tracks having hilly or bumpy terrain.

champ.name: Tutorial Curly
champ.descr: Tutorial with very tiny but curly tracks. Requires a lot of steering.

champ.name: Tutorial Jumps
champ.descr: Tutorial for training jumps. Car velocity before jump is most important. In easy mode, you need to use boost to reach it.

champ.name: Tutorial Loops
champ.descr: Tutorial for driving in loops. Loops and side loops will appear as well as simple pipe turns and some twists.

champ.name: Tutorial Pipes
champ.descr: Tutorial for road pipes. Mostly driving inside glass pipes. Some tracks are twisted.

champ.name: Short Rally
champ.descr: Best short tracks in game, for rally fans, in interesting sceneries.

champ.name: Beauty Rally
champ.descr: The best long, beautiful, scenic rally tracks in game.

champ.name: Yet more rally
champ.descr: Other short tracks in game. Some quite circullar.

champ.name: Fast fun
champ.descr: Fast, short tracks in game. Some quite curly and banked. Driven flat-out.

champ.name: Bumpy shorts
champ.descr: The most bumpy tracks. Difficult to keep on road, if you drive too fast.

champ.name: Long trip
champ.descr: The longest rally tracks, for those who want to drive a lot, in nice sceneries.

champ.name: Curly shorts
champ.descr: Short, curly and tricky tracks with sharp turns.

champ.name: Fancy circles
champ.descr: The most circullar tracks. Usualy banked, sometimes with easy pipe turns. Require much steering but mostly in same direction.

champ.name: Ancient cities
champ.descr: Driving in peaceful small towns with many buildings, frozen in ancient times. Sometimes quite narrow and with sharp turns.

champ.name: Master of Rally
champ.descr: Great, medium long tracks in game, for rally fans, with great views.

champ.name: Mud and water fan
champ.descr: A collection of tracks that have either water or mud drive through areas. Mostly in jungle, some are slippery and tricky.

champ.name: Mountain adventure
champ.descr: Tracks placed in mountains and with highest height differences, also with good views.

champ.name: Frenzy fellow
champ.descr: Curly tracks, sometimes banked, frequently changing directions. Require lots of steering.

champ.name: Extreme weather
champ.descr: Short tracks in difficult conditions. Heavy rain, snow, fog or dark.

champ.name: Dark chase
champ.descr: The darkest tracks. Short ones with 2 laps.

champ.name: Master of Stunts
champ.descr: Best stunt tracks in game, very twisted and difficult. With plenty of loops, jumps and twisted bridges. Lets you master your stunt driving.

champ.name: Pipes mastery
champ.descr: Only pipe tracks with high difficulty, extremely curly. Don't drive too fast, it damages car. Lets you master your pipe driving.

champ.name: Curly master
champ.descr: Curly tracks, driven mad. Require lots of steering, determination and experience.

champ.name: Jump mania
champ.descr: Tracks with lots of jumps. Fast cars are needed (or boosting to reach jump speeds).

champ.name: Insane stunts
champ.descr: The very difficult, insanely twisted tracks. Require the most skills and determination. Recommended to do both Stunts and Pipes mastery before.

champ.name: Stunt madness
champ.descr: The most difficult and complicated stunt tracks. Require great skills and determination. Recommended to do after all others.

champ.name: Desert
champ.descr: Desert championship. Part 1.

champ.name: Desert 2nd
champ.descr: Desert champ. Part 2.

champ.name: Jungle
champ.descr: Jungle championship. Part 1.

champ.name: Jungle 2nd
champ.descr: Jungle championship. Part 2.

champ.name: Savanna
champ.descr: Savanna championship. Part 1.

champ.name: Savanna 2nd
champ.descr: Savanna championship. Part 2.

champ.name: Winter
champ.descr: Winter championship. Part 1.

champ.name: Winter 2nd
champ.descr: Winter championship. Part 2.

champ.name: Forest
champ.descr: Forest championship. Part 1.

champ.name: Forest 2nd
champ.descr: Forest championship. Part 2.

champ.name: Island
champ.descr: Island championship. Part 1.

champ.name: Island 2nd
champ.descr: Island championship. Part 2.

champ.name: Mud
champ.descr: Mud championship.

champ.name: Canyon
champ.descr: Canyon championship.

champ.name: Australia
champ.descr: Australia championship.

champ.name: Greece
champ.descr: Greece championship.

champ.name: Finland
champ.descr: Finland championship.

champ.name: Autumn
champ.descr: Autumn championship.

champ.name: Moss
champ.descr: Moss championship.

champ.name: Volcanic
champ.descr: Volcanic championship.

champ.name: Unidentified
champ.descr: Unidentified championship.

champ.name: Mars
champ.descr: Mars championship.

champ.name: Crystals
champ.descr: Crystals championship.

champ.name: Test-1
champ.descr: Fastest 1 track, to test logic.

champ.name: Test-3
champ.descr: Fastest 3 tracks, to test logic.

champ.name: Test tracks
champ.descr: Really short and circular tracks. 2 Laps on each.
